title: 搭建服务器的时候为甚么这样？=_-b
author: 峻小子
txt_content:
打开bat之后..

Error occurred during initialization of vM
Could not reserve enough space for object heap
Press any key to continue . . .

如何解决？

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
峻小子 发表于 2012-8-9 21:13 
@ECHO OFF
java -Xms1g -Xmx1g -jar craftbukkit-1.3.1-R1.0.jar
pause
@ECHO OFF
SET BINDIR=%~dp0
CD /D "%BINDIR%"
java -Xincgc -Xmx1g -jar craftbukkit-1.3.1-R1.0.jar
pause


尝试

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content: 估计服务器java内存参数设置不对，请贴出bat内容（记事本打开）

replies.author: 峻小子
replies.txt_content:
strawmaine 发表于 2012-8-9 21:09 
估计服务器java内存参数设置不对，请贴出bat内容（记事本打开）
@ECHO OFF
java -Xms1g -Xmx1g -jar craftbukkit-1.3.1-R1.0.jar
pause

以上

replies.author: 峻小子
replies.txt_content:
Hao 发表于 2012-8-9 21:27 
没写好要用的内存吧。。。
哪儿写的....
